[C] During your turn, all your other Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] Your other "Ichika Nakano, Dozing" gain +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Quintuplets:: from your hand to the Waiting Room]"
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Sucker Punch" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, Rest it and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Reward for a Hard Worker" is in your Climax Zone, search your Library for up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] When you use BACKUP of this, if all your Characters are ::Quintuplets::, you may put the top card of your Library in Stock.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
--None--

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Quintuplets:: Characters.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, all your ::Quintuplets:: Characters gain +500 Power and +1 Soul for the turn.

Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character from among them, reveal it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, discard the remaining cards to the Waiting Room, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +3000 Power.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this gains +1500 Power.

[C] For each of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[C] During your turn, for each of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Quintuplets:: Characters.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Quintuplets:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] When your Climax is placed in the Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Quintuplets:: Character, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When this attacks, if "Girl Power Full Throttle!" is in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other Characters and this, and those Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand."
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters.

[C] For each of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] For each of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

BRAINSTORM Flip over the top 3 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. Choose a Level X or lower ::Quintuplets:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand. X = # of ::Quintuplets:: Character cards revealed from among them.
Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, you may draw a card. If so, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] All your other "Nino Nakano, Words of Criticism" gain +500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character from hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] [(1)] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Secret Student Handbook" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your hand, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Quintuplets:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1000, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
--None--

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.

[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] If you are Level 2 or higher, this gains the following ability. "[S] [Put this in the Waiting Room] Choose up to 1 'Miku Nakano, A Girl's Mind' in your hand and place it to the slot this was in."
[A] [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Miku Nakano, A Girl's Mind", reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Green Tea Soda" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character on the bottom of the Library.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Quintuplets:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, search your Library for up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] [(2) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so put the bottom 4 cards of your Opponent's Library into their Waiting Room, deal X Damage to your Opponent, and for the turn this gains +1000 Power. X equals the number of Climax Cards put in the Waiting Room by this Ability. (Damage Cancel can occur)
Search your Library for up to 2 ::Quintuplets:: Characters, reveal them, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.

X equals the sum of the Levels of the cards put into Waiting Room by this effect.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".
--None--

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.

Choose up to 2 Characters in your Waiting Room and return them to your hand.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Discard a ::Quintuplets:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When "Unexpected Approach" is placed to your Climax Zone, if you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, you may pay cost. If so, this gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When Damage dealt by this is Canceled, you may deal 2 Damage to your Opponent twice." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this attacks, if you have another ::Quintuplets:: Character, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Beautiful Woman Blooming in the Darkness" is in the Climax Zone and there are 6 or fewer cards in your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] For each of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock in your Stock.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, this gains +2 Soul for the turn.
[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Quintuplets:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When your Climax card with a Choice Trigger Icon is placed in the Climax Zone, reveal the top card of your Library. If it is a ::Quintuplets:: Character or an Event, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card with a Choice Trigger Icon revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Quintuplets:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] During your turn, if all of your Characters have "Ichika" in name, this gains +2000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(1)] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, perform Trigger Check twice during this attack's Trigger Step."

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library and search for up to 2 ::Quintuplets:: Characters, reveal them, put them in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Becoming Ghosts" is in your Climax Zone, put up to 1 card from top of your Library in your Stock, then reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or higher, put it in your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise put it back where it was)

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw a card, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room, and choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to hand.
[A] [Discard a Climax card from hand to the Waiting Room] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other ::Quintuplets:: Characters and this, Stand and swap them, and that ::Quintuplets:: Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] [(1) Discard a ::Quintuplets:: Character card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them and put it to your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[C] Character Opposite this cannot move to another Slot.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it is a Character with "Yotsuba" in name, this gains +2000 Power for the turn. (Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other Characters with "Yotsuba" in name, Rest it, and move it to an open slot in the Back Row.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Quintuplets:: Characters, you may choose a ::Quintuplets:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock.

If so, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters whose Level is higher than the Level of your Opponent and put it in the Waiting Room.

[S] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] Choose a card in your Clock and return it to your hand, put the top card of your Library in your Clock, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power for the turn.
